query.value: UPDATE TIMECLOUD_FILE SET C_DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE N_IDX = ?
UPDATE TIMECLOUD_FILE SET N_DOWNLOAD_COUNT = N_DOWNLOAD_COUNT + 1 WHERE N_IDX = ?

SELECT A.N_IDX ,A.V_ORIGIN_NAME ,A.V_SAVE_NAME ,A.V_EXT ,A.N_FILE_SIZE ,A.N_OWNER_IDX ,A.V_REG_DATETIME ,A.C_DEL_YN ,B.V_NAME ,A.N_TASK_IDX ,A.N_DOWNLOAD_COUNT ,FN_TIMEGAP(A.V_REG_DATETIME) as timegap FROM TIMECLOUD_FILE A, TIMECLOUD_USER B WHERE A.N_TASK_IDX = ? AND A.C_DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.N_OWNER_IDX = B.N_IDX ORDER BY A.N_IDX ASC

SELECT X.N_IDX, X.N_OWNER_IDX,X.N_TASK_IDX, X.V_ORIGIN_NAME, X.V_REG_DATETIME, Y.V_DESC AS V_TASK_DESC, Y.N_OWNER_IDX AS N_TASK_OWNER, (SELECT V_NAME FROM TIMECLOUD_USER WHERE N_IDX=X.N_OWNER_IDX) AS V_FILE_OWNER FROM TIMECLOUD_FILE X, TIMECLOUD_TASK Y WHERE X.N_TASK_IDX = Y.N_IDX AND X.C_DEL_YN = 'N' AND Y.N_LIST= ? ORDER BY X.N_TASK_IDX ASC, X.N_IDX ASC
SELECT N_IDX, N_TASK_IDX, V_ORIGIN_NAME, V_SAVE_NAME, V_EXT, N_FILE_SIZE, N_OWNER_IDX, V_REG_DATETIME, C_DEL_YN FROM TIMECLOUD_FILE WHERE N_IDX = ?

INSERT INTO TIMECLOUD_FILE ( N_IDX, N_TASK_IDX, V_ORIGIN_NAME, V_SAVE_NAME, V_EXT, N_FILE_SIZE, N_OWNER_IDX, V_REG_DATETIME, C_DEL_YN, N_DOMAIN_IDX ) VALUES ( ?, -- N_IDX ?, -- N_TASK_IDX ?, -- V_ORIGIN_NAME ?, -- V_SAVE_NAME ?, -- V_EXT ?, -- N_FIEL_SIZE ?, -- N_OWNER_IDX TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), -- V_REG_DATE 'N', ? -- N_DOMAIN_IDX )

SELECT X.N_IDX, X.N_OWNER_IDX, X.N_TASK_IDX, X.V_ORIGIN_NAME, X.V_REG_DATETIME, Y.V_DESC AS V_TASK_DESC,Y.N_OWNER_IDX AS N_TASK_OWNER, (SELECT V_NAME FROM TIMECLOUD_USER WHERE N_IDX=X.N_OWNER_IDX) AS V_FILE_OWNER ,Y.C_STATUS FROM TIMECLOUD_FILE X, ( SELECT A.V_DESC, A.N_IDX, A.N_OWNER_IDX, A.C_STATUS FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK A , ( SELECT N_LIST FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK WHERE N_OWNER_IDX = ? GROUP BY N_LIST) B WHERE A.N_LIST = B.N_LIST UNION SELECT A.V_DESC, A.N_IDX, A.N_OWNER_IDX, A.C_STATUS FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK A , ( SELECT E.N_IDX AS N_TASK_IDX FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK E, ( SELECT D.N_LIST FROM TIMECLOUD_OBSERVER C, TIMECLOUD_TASK D WHERE (C.N_TASK_IDX=D.N_IDX) AND C.N_OWNER_IDX = ? GROUP BY D.N_LIST ) F WHERE E.N_LIST = F.N_LIST ) B WHERE A.N_IDX = B.N_TASK_IDX ) Y WHERE X.N_TASK_IDX=Y.N_IDX AND X.C_DEL_YN='N' ORDER BY X.N_IDX DESC

query.value: SELECT X.N_IDX, X.N_OWNER_IDX,X.N_TASK_IDX, X.V_ORIGIN_NAME, X.V_REG_DATETIME, Y.V_DESC AS V_TASK_DESC,Y.N_OWNER_IDX AS N_TASK_OWNER, (SELECT V_NAME FROM TIMECLOUD_USER WHERE N_IDX=X.N_OWNER_IDX) AS V_FILE_OWNER ,Y.C_STATUS FROM TIMECLOUD_FILE X, TIMECLOUD_TASK Y WHERE X.N_TASK_IDX = Y.N_IDX AND X.C_DEL_YN='N' AND Y.N_OWNER_IDX=? ORDER BY X.N_IDX DESC

SELECT X.N_IDX, X.N_OWNER_IDX, X.N_TASK_IDX, X.V_ORIGIN_NAME, X.V_REG_DATETIME, Y.V_DESC AS V_TASK_DESC,Y.N_OWNER_IDX AS N_TASK_OWNER, (SELECT V_NAME FROM TIMECLOUD_USER WHERE N_IDX=X.N_OWNER_IDX) AS V_FILE_OWNER ,Y.C_STATUS FROM TIMECLOUD_FILE X, ( SELECT A.V_DESC, A.N_IDX, A.N_OWNER_IDX, A.C_STATUS FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK A, TIMECLOUD_TASK B WHERE (A.N_PARENT_IDX = B.N_IDX) AND A.N_LEVEL > 0 AND B.N_OWNER_IDX = ? ) Y WHERE X.N_TASK_IDX=Y.N_IDX AND X.C_DEL_YN='N' ORDER BY X.N_IDX DESC

SELECT X.N_IDX, X.N_OWNER_IDX,X.N_TASK_IDX, X.V_ORIGIN_NAME, X.V_REG_DATETIME, Y.V_DESC AS V_TASK_DESC,Y.N_OWNER_IDX AS N_TASK_OWNER, (SELECT V_NAME FROM TIMECLOUD_USER WHERE N_IDX=X.N_OWNER_IDX) AS V_FILE_OWNER ,Y.C_STATUS FROM TIMECLOUD_FILE X, TIMECLOUD_TASK Y, TIMECLOUD_OBSERVER Z WHERE (X.N_TASK_IDX = Y.N_IDX AND Y.N_IDX = Z.N_TASK_IDX) AND X.C_DEL_YN='N' AND Z.N_OWNER_IDX = ? ORDER BY X.N_IDX DESC
